template.name: DB PostgreSQL (Active, DBMON, for all OS)
template.description: Template for monitoring PostgreSQL DB for all OS (active agent)

trigger.name: Zabbix agent for database monitoring is unreachable for more {$DBS_DBMON_AGENTD_NODATA_CRIT} (minutes)
Zabbix agent for database monitoring is unreachable for more {$DBS_DBMON_AGENTD_NODATA_WARN} (minutes)

dependency.name: Zabbix agent for database monitoring is unreachable for more {$DBS_DBMON_AGENTD_NODATA_CRIT} (minutes)

item.name: [PgSQL] Instance '{$DBS_PGSQL_INSTANCE}': Get connections stat
item.description: Collect all metrics from pg_stat_activity See more info: https://www.postgresql.org/docs/current/monitoring-stats.html#PG-STAT-ACTIVITY-VIEW

item.name: [PgSQL] Instance '{$DBS_PGSQL_INSTANCE}': Get database locks
item.description: Collect all metrics from pg_locks per database See more info: https://www.postgresql.org/docs/current/explicit-locking.html#LOCKING-TABLES

item.name: [PgSQL] Instance '{$DBS_PGSQL_INSTANCE}': Get database stat sum
item.description: Collect pg_stat_database. See more info: https://www.postgresql.org/docs/current/monitoring-stats.html#PG-STAT-DATABASE-VIEW

item.name: [PgSQL] Instance '{$DBS_PGSQL_INSTANCE}': Get database stat
item.description: Collect all metrics from pg_stat_database per database See more info: https://www.postgresql.org/docs/current/monitoring-stats.html#PG-STAT-DATABASE-VIEW

item.name: [PgSQL] Instance '{$DBS_PGSQL_INSTANCE}' connections: Active
item.description: Total number of connections executing a query

item.name: [PgSQL] Instance '{$DBS_PGSQL_INSTANCE}' connections: fastpath function call
item.description: Total number of connections in a transaction state, but not executing a query

item.name: [PgSQL] Instance '{$DBS_PGSQL_INSTANCE}' connections: Idle
item.description: Total number of connections waiting for a new client command

item.name: [PgSQL] Instance '{$DBS_PGSQL_INSTANCE}' connections: Idle in transaction
item.description: Total number of connections in a transaction state, but not executing a query

item.name: [PgSQL] Instance '{$DBS_PGSQL_INSTANCE}' connections: Get connections idle in transaction (aborted)
item.description: Total number of connections in a transaction state, but not executing a query and one of the statements in the transaction caused an error.

item.name: [PgSQL] Instance '{$DBS_PGSQL_INSTANCE}' connections: Prepared
item.description: Total number of prepared transactions https://www.postgresql.org/docs/current/sql-prepare-transaction.html

item.name: [PgSQL] Instance '{$DBS_PGSQL_INSTANCE}' connections: Total
item.description: Total number of connections

item.name: [PgSQL] Instance '{$DBS_PGSQL_INSTANCE}' connections: Total %
item.description: Total number of connections in percentage

item.name: [PgSQL] Instance '{$DBS_PGSQL_INSTANCE}' connections: Waiting
item.description: Total number of waiting connections https://www.postgresql.org/docs/current/monitoring-stats.html#WAIT-EVENT-TABLE

item.name: [PgSQL] Instance '{$DBS_PGSQL_INSTANCE}' statistic: Hit blocks read
item.description: Number of times disk blocks were found already in the buffer cache.

item.name: [PgSQL] Instance '{$DBS_PGSQL_INSTANCE}' statistic: Disk blocks read
item.description: Number of disk blocks read.

item.name: [PgSQL] Instance '{$DBS_PGSQL_INSTANCE}' statistic: Blocks read time
item.description: Time spent reading data file blocks by backends, in milliseconds.

item.name: [PgSQL] Instance '{$DBS_PGSQL_INSTANCE}' statistic: Blocks write time
item.description: Time spent writing data file blocks by backends, in milliseconds.

item.name: [PgSQL] Instance '{$DBS_PGSQL_INSTANCE}' statistic: Checksum failures
item.description: Number of data page checksum failures detected (or on a shared object), or NULL if data checksums are not enabled. This metric included in PostgreSQL 12

item.name: [PgSQL] Instance '{$DBS_PGSQL_INSTANCE}' statistic: Conflicts
item.description: Number of queries canceled due to conflicts with recovery (Conflicts occur only on standby servers; see pg_stat_database_conflicts for details)

item.name: [PgSQL] Instance '{$DBS_PGSQL_INSTANCE}' statistic: Deadlocks
item.description: Number of deadlocks detected.

item.name: [PgSQL] Instance '{$DBS_PGSQL_INSTANCE}' statistic: Number temp bytes
item.description: Total amount of data written to temporary files by queries.

item.name: [PgSQL] Instance '{$DBS_PGSQL_INSTANCE}' statistic: Number temp files
item.description: Number of temporary files created by queries.

item.name: [PgSQL] Instance '{$DBS_PGSQL_INSTANCE}' statistic: Rows deleted
item.description: Number of rows deleted by queries.

item.name: [PgSQL] Instance '{$DBS_PGSQL_INSTANCE}' statistic: Rows fetched
item.description: Number of rows fetched by queries.

item.name: [PgSQL] Instance '{$DBS_PGSQL_INSTANCE}' statistic: Rows inserted
item.description: Number of rows inserted by queries.

item.name: [PgSQL] Instance '{$DBS_PGSQL_INSTANCE}' statistic: Rows returned
item.description: Number of rows returned by queries.

item.name: [PgSQL] Instance '{$DBS_PGSQL_INSTANCE}' statistic: Rows updated
item.description: Number of rows updated by queries.

item.name: [PgSQL] Instance '{$DBS_PGSQL_INSTANCE}' statistic: Committed transactions
item.description: Number of transactions that have been committed.

item.name: [PgSQL] Instance '{$DBS_PGSQL_INSTANCE}' statistic: Roll backed transactions
item.description: Number of transactions that have been rolled back.

item.name: [PgSQL] Instance '{$DBS_PGSQL_INSTANCE}': Startup time
item.description: The time at which PostgreSQL was started.

item.name: [PgSQL] Instance '{$DBS_PGSQL_INSTANCE}': Uptime
item.description: The number of seconds that the server has been up.

trigger.name: Instance '{$DBS_PGSQL_INSTANCE}' has just been restarted
trigger.description: Процесс (сервис) postgres был перезапущен. Необходимо проверить факт перезапуска на сервере заказчика, проверить логи (postgres.log), далее уточнить в чате кто произвел перезапуск. Возможно, что перезапуск произошел в результате краха процесса в автоматическом режиме. Доведите информацию до заказчика и эксперта.

item.name: [PgSQL] Instance '{$DBS_PGSQL_INSTANCE}': Version full
item.description: Full PostgreSQL version information (number and vendor).

item.name: [PgSQL] Instance '{$DBS_PGSQL_INSTANCE}': Ping
item.description: Test connection with an instance of PostgreSQL.

trigger.name: Database test connection data not received for more than {$DBS_PGSQL_PING_NODATA_CRIT} (minutes)
trigger.description: Данные о доступности экземпляра БД PostgreSQL не поступали более {$DBS_PGSQL_PING_NODATA_CRIT} (минут). Необходимо проверить работу экземпляра БД, далее проверить работу и настройки zabbix-agent. Сообщить о проблеме эксперту в соответствующий чат.

dependency.name: Zabbix agent for database monitoring is unreachable for more {$DBS_DBMON_AGENTD_NODATA_CRIT} (minutes)

trigger.name: Database test connection data not received for more than {$DBS_PGSQL_PING_NODATA_WARN} (minutes)
trigger.description: Данные о доступности экземпляра БД PostgreSQL не поступали более {$DBS_PGSQL_PING_NODATA_WARN} (минут). Необходимо проверить работу экземпляра БД, далее проверить работу и настройки zabbix-agent-dbmon. Сообщить о проблеме эксперту в соответствующий чат.

dependency.name: Database test connection data not received for more than {$DBS_PGSQL_PING_NODATA_CRIT} (minutes)
Zabbix agent for database monitoring is unreachable for more {$DBS_DBMON_AGENTD_NODATA_WARN} (minutes)

trigger.name: Instance access failed
trigger.description: Тестовое подключение к экземпляру БД PostgreSQL не успешно. Необходимо проверить работу экземпляра БД, посмотреть postgres.log, далее проверить работу и настройки zabbix-agent.

dependency.name: Database test connection data not received for more than {$DBS_PGSQL_PING_NODATA_WARN} (minutes)

item.name: [PgSQL] Instance '{$DBS_PGSQL_INSTANCE}': Version
item.description: Version of PostgreSQL instance.

trigger.name: Version of PostgreSQL has been changed
trigger.description: Версия экземпляра PostgreSQL была изменена. Необходимо проверить факт изменения версии, выяснить причину изменения версии (плановый апгрейд и т.п.), передать данные эксперту.

item_prototype.name: [PgSQL] Database '{#DBNAME}': Num of accessexclusive locks
item_prototype.description: Number of accessexclusive locks for each database

item_prototype.name: [PgSQL] Database '{#DBNAME}': Num of accessshare locks
item_prototype.description: Number of accessshare locks for each database

item_prototype.name: [PgSQL] Database '{#DBNAME}': Num of exclusive locks
item_prototype.description: Number of exclusive locks for each database

item_prototype.name: [PgSQL] Database '{#DBNAME}': Num of rowexclusive locks
item_prototype.description: Number of rowexclusive locks for each database

item_prototype.name: [PgSQL] Database '{#DBNAME}': Num of rowshare locks
item_prototype.description: Number of rowshare locks for each database

item_prototype.name: [PgSQL] Database '{#DBNAME}': Num of sharerowexclusive locks
item_prototype.description: Number of total sharerowexclusive for each database

item_prototype.name: [PgSQL] Database '{#DBNAME}': Num of shareupdateexclusive locks
item_prototype.description: Number of shareupdateexclusive locks for each database

item_prototype.name: [PgSQL] Database '{#DBNAME}': Num of share locks
item_prototype.description: Number of share locks for each database

item_prototype.name: [PgSQL] Database '{#DBNAME}': Num of total locks
item_prototype.description: Number of total locks for each database

item_prototype.name: [PgSQL] Database '{#DBNAME}': Blocks hit per second
item_prototype.description: Total number of times disk blocks were found already in the buffer cache, so that a read was not necessary

item_prototype.name: [PgSQL] Database '{#DBNAME}': Disk blocks read per second
item_prototype.description: Total number of disk blocks read in this database

item_prototype.name: [PgSQL] Database '{#DBNAME}': Detected conflicts per second
item_prototype.description: Total number of queries canceled due to conflicts with recovery in this database

trigger_prototype.name: Too many recovery conflicts over last 5 minutes
trigger_prototype.description: The primary and standby servers are in many ways loosely connected. Actions on the primary will have an effect on the standby. As a result, there is potential for negative interactions or conflicts between them. See more info: https://www.postgresql.org/docs/current/hot-standby.html#HOT-STANDBY-CONFLICT

item_prototype.name: [PgSQL] Database '{#DBNAME}': Detected deadlocks per second
item_prototype.description: Total number of detected deadlocks in this database

trigger_prototype.name: Deadlock has been occurred over last 5 minutes

item_prototype.name: [PgSQL] Database '{#DBNAME}': Temp_bytes written per second
item_prototype.description: Total amount of data written to temporary files by queries in this database

item_prototype.name: [PgSQL] Database '{#DBNAME}': Temp_files created per second
item_prototype.description: Total number of temporary files created by queries in this database

item_prototype.name: [PgSQL] Database '{#DBNAME}': Tuples deleted per second
item_prototype.description: Total number of rows deleted by queries in this database

item_prototype.name: [PgSQL] Database '{#DBNAME}': Tuples fetched per second
item_prototype.description: Total number of rows fetched by queries in this database

item_prototype.name: [PgSQL] Database '{#DBNAME}': Tuples inserted per second
item_prototype.description: Total number of rows inserted by queries in this database

item_prototype.name: [PgSQL] Database '{#DBNAME}': Tuples returned per second
item_prototype.description: Total number of rows updated by queries in this database

item_prototype.name: [PgSQL] Database '{#DBNAME}': Tuples updated per second
item_prototype.description: Total number of rows updated by queries in this database

item_prototype.name: [PgSQL] Database '{#DBNAME}': Commits per second
item_prototype.description: Number of transactions in this database that have been committed

item_prototype.name: [PgSQL] Database '{#DBNAME}': Rollbacks per second
item_prototype.description: Total number of transactions in this database that have been rolled back

macro.value: host=localhost port=5432 dbname=template1 user=postgres password=postgres connect_timeout=10
